docs.lead_paragraph: The true intent of the partial-birth abortion ban is to make all abortions as burdensome, as difficult and as emotionally and physically trying for women — and for doctors — as possible.

docs.lead_paragraph: A mother has been indicted on two counts of endangering the welfare of a child, a misdemeanor, and two counts of reckless endangerment since her child was placed on life support.

headline.main: A Baby Girl’s Bath Becomes a Young Couple’s Nightmare
headline.print_headline: A Baby Girl’s Bath Becomes A Young Couple’s Nightmare

docs.snippet: A mother has been indicted on two counts of endangering the welfare of a child, a misdemeanor, and two counts of reckless endangerment since her child was placed on life support.

byline.original: By MICHAEL WILSON and MICHAEL BRICK

docs.lead_paragraph: STEADMAN--E. Thomas. The faculty of the Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at NewYork-Presbyterian Hospital/Weill Cornell Medical Center and Weill Cornell Medical College express their deep sorrow on the death of their esteemed colleague, Dr. E. Thomas Steadman. Dr. Steadman, who did his residency training at this Hospital, was influential in developing the first nurse-midwifery program in a private medical facility in the U.S., as well as the first teenage pregnancy clinic in New York City. A dedicated clinician and teacher for more than 40 years, Dr. Steadman was an important role model for medical students and house officers. His presence will be sorely missed. Frank A. Chervenak, M.D. Given Foundation Professor and Chairman, Dept. of Obstetrics and Gynecology, Weill Cornell Medical College Obstetrician and Gynecologist-in-Chief at NewYork Presbyterian Hospital/Weill Cornell Medical Center

He was an unparalleled and dedicated friend to many. Barbara and Stephen Phillips

docs.lead_paragraph: The suit, brought on behalf of female drug sales workers at Novartis, claims the company discriminated against them in pay, promotions and personnel evaluations.
